text: The rainy season is the time of year when most of a region's average annual rainfall occurs. Rainy Season may also refer to: * Rainy Season (short story), a 1989 short horror story by Stephen King * The Rainy Season, a 1993 album by Marc Cohn * The Rainy Season, a 1999 novel by James Blaylock * Rainy Seasons (film), a 2010 Iranian film
title: Rainy Season
